tool_description: An API to call an Uber car to your location.
name: Uber
title: Uber

api_list.name: product information
api_list.description: The Products endpoint returns information about the Uber products offered at a given location. The response includes the display name and other details about each product, and lists the products in the proper display order.

api_list.name: product ETAs
api_list.description: The Time Estimates endpoint returns ETAs for all products offered at a given location, with the responses expressed as integers in seconds. We recommend that this endpoint be called every minute to provide the most accurate, up-to-date ETAs.

optional_parameters.name: customer_uuid
optional_parameters.description: Unique customer identifier to be used for experience customization.

optional_parameters.name: product_id
optional_parameters.description: Unique identifier representing a specific product for a given latitude & longitude.

api_list.name: User information
api_list.description: The User Profile endpoint returns information about the Uber user that has authorized with the application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://t14ha70d-uber-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/me"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "t14ha70d-uber-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://t14ha70d-uber-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/me"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "t14ha70d-uber-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: User lifetime activity
api_list.description: The User Activity endpoint returns data about a user's lifetime activity with Uber. The response will include pickup locations and times, dropoff locations and times, the distance of past requests, and information about which products were requested.

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: Offset the list of returned results by this amount. Default is zero.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve. Default is 5, maximum is 100.

api_list.name: Estimated price range
api_list.description: The Price Estimates endpoint returns an estimated price range for each product offered at a given location. The price estimate is provided as a formatted string with the full price range and the localized currency symbol.
